interests: Identifying, characterizing and developing interventions for high risk emergency department patients
Evaluating optimal naloxone dosing in ultra-potent opioid overdoses
Developing approaches to emergency department screening for opioid use disorder
Evaluating buprenorphine/naloxone standard dosing and microdosing interventions
researchOptions: I am available and interested in collaborations (e.g. clusters, grants).
I am interested in and conduct interdisciplinary research.
I am interested in working with undergraduate students on research projects.
